Tip of the Day
Being overencumbered only slows down your activities, but doesn't affect travel.

Silver nugget
Type: Material
Value: 4
Fine Value: 28
Keyword: Nugget
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

Silver is a highly prized metal, frequently utilized in the creation of jewelry such as rings, amulets and earrings.

The Silver nugget item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Silver nugget is an ingredient in the following recipe:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs
Smelt a silver bar Needs Basic Forge service or better. Smithing lvl. 5 7x Silver nugget or 2x Silver ore 1x Silver bar

Job Boards

Silver nugget can be requested from the following job:

Job Board Name Location Quantity Item Type Rewards
Everhaven combined job board Everhaven 10 +1  Erdwise Faction Reputation
1x   Smithing chest

Trivia

  • When rolling for silver nuggets from smithing recipes there is a 7% chance per ore used in the recipe.
